entry.title: Friday: Mainly sunny. High minus 21.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light this morning. High minus 21. Wind chill minus 44 this morning and minus 30 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 04:00 AM EST Friday 17 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 27.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 27. Wind chill minus 31 this evening and minus 38 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 04:00 AM EST Friday 17 March 2023
